name: PT Kuliner Poll Indonesia
description: Provider of online catering services intended for daily and eventual meals from white-collar workers working in central business district areas to the modern housewives. The company's serving includes Indonesian, Asian, Western and Japanese dishes with high-quality chefs and prioritizing delicious and hygienic flavors, providing meals that are tasty, clean and affordable for everyone to purchase.
